titleStmt.title: The doctrine of superioritie, and of subiection, contained in the fift commandement of the holy law of almightie God Which is the foundamentall ground, both of all Christian subiection: and also of like Christian gouernment, as well in church, and common-wealth, as in euery schoole and priuate familie. A pretious memorial of the substance of manie godly sermons, preached by the learned and faithfull seruant of God, Ma. Robert Pricke, minister of the vvord, at Denham in Suffolke.
titleStmt.author: Pricke, Robert, d. ca. 1608.
Allen, Robert, fl. 1596-1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by T. Creede] for Ephraim Dawson, and Thomas Downe, and are to be sold at their shop in Fleete-streete, at the Inner Temple gate,

notesStmt.note: Editor's dedication signed: R. A. i.e., Robert Allen.
Print faded and show-through; pages marked, stained and torn.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: their shop in Fleete-streete, at the Inner Temple gate
